news.title: Wild Pixels Tournament Series Announced
news.text:
News #1: Wild Pixels Tournament Series Announced

Get ready for battle! We’re launching the{' '}Wild Pixels Tournament Series this fall. Compete in weeklybrackets, climb the leaderboard, and earn exclusive digital rewards.Whether you're a solo warrior or a team strategist — the arenaawaits you.

Registration opens next week.

news.title: Community Nights Begin
news.text: Join us every Friday for community game nights! Share builds, test ideas, or just vibe with others who love games. First session starts August 16th — see you on Discord!

news.title: Devlog Incoming
news.text: We’re opening up our development process. Follow our devlogs and help shape the Wild Pixels experience together. First entry drops soon.
